attributes.action: Ban the development of child and animal sex robots
attributes.additional_details:
Companies are now creating sex robots that look like children and have further plans to create sex robots in the form of animals with the intention of selling them to the NHS as a means of controlling sexual deviants of this nature. The idea itself is disgusting and is likely to create more peadophiles than it wil stop.

Please ban these developments that will likely be detromental to society by normalising peadophilia.
